Package boundary

Class MonitorInventoryBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.Boundary
boundary.MonitorInventoryBoundary
public class MonitorInventoryBoundary extends Boundary
MonitorInventoryBoundary manages the user interface for monitoring and managing inventory levels of medicines, including checking for expired and low-stock items.

Provides options to remove expired medicines from stock and lists items below the low-stock threshold.
